DOC.brief_summary: Stretching frequently use clinical practice manage musculoskeletal discomfort prevent sport injury . It know stretch affect pain sensitivity . The purpose study investigate 4 week daily stretch protocol alters pain sensitivity . The investigator hypothesize stretch reduces pain sensitivity .
